sentences.en: Besides doing our own job well, we can donate money to them.
sentences.cn: 除了把自己的工作做好以为, 我们可以捐钱给他们.

sentences.en: Don't just ask for something while forgetting to donate.
sentences.cn: 不要只顾求索,而忘记付出.

sentences.en: Donate some coffins to the temple, equal to the number of deaths.
sentences.cn: 到寺庙里, 捐赠棺材盒给这些死者吧.

sentences.en: He frequently donates large sums to charity.
sentences.cn: 他经常向慈善机构大笔捐款。

sentences.en: Many people offered to donate blood and skin for the badly burnt worker.
sentences.cn: 很多人要求为那个严重烧伤的工人献血献皮.

sentences.en: More than 100 men hurried to the scene to donate their blood.
people who volunteer to donate blood
Pictures of starving children have sent many people scurrying to donate money.
sentences.cn: 看到一张张忍饥挨饿的孩子们的照片，许多人赶忙捐钱。

sentences.en: Sha Sha you might use the same way to donate.
sentences.cn: 莎莎你也可以通过这样的方式来捐款.

sentences.en: She is willing to donate money to a worthy cause.
sentences.cn: 她愿为高尚的事业捐款.

sentences.en: The person that there is hypoglycemia symptom whether donate blood?
sentences.cn: 有低血糖症状的人能否献血?

sentences.en: The United States corporations donate to charity and other nonprofit purposes some $ 1,600 million annually.
sentences.cn: 美国各大公司每年为慈善事业和其它非牟利事业捐款约十六亿美元.

sentences.en: They used to donate large sum of money to the Red Cross every year.
sentences.cn: 他们过去每年都向红十字会捐献大笔的钱.

sentences.en: They used to donate to the Red Cross every year.
sentences.cn: 他们每年捐钱给红十字会.

sentences.en: This led Zagreb's twin town, Mainz, to donate £70,000-worth of high-quality equipment.
sentences.cn: 这使得萨格勒布的友好城市美因茨捐赠了价值7万英镑的高品质装备。

sentences.en: We are happy to donate to bona fide charitable causes.
sentences.cn: 我们很乐意为真正的慈善事业捐献财物。

sentences.en: What would you say to donate some money to the church?
sentences.cn: 给教堂捐些钱您看怎么样?

trans.tran_en: to give something, especially money, to a person or an organization in order to help them
to give something, especially money, to a person or an organization in order to help them
